items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Initializes the object with a custom authorization method.

items.name: static let videoSubscriberAccount: ASAuthorizationCustomMethod
items.desc: A type of authorization that uses a TV provider account to sign in.

items.name: static let restorePurchase: ASAuthorizationCustomMethod
items.desc: A type of authorization that restores an in-app purchase to sign in.

items.name: static let other: ASAuthorizationCustomMethod
items.desc: A type of authorization that uses a custom sign-in method.
